SELECT id, name, DTYPE FROM group_table
mapper.update: UPDATE group_table SET name = #{name}, DTYPE = "${groupType}" WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Ownership WHERE ((lowerId = #{id} AND ownershipType="GROUP") OR upper_id = #{id} ) AND id > 0; DELETE FROM group_table WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT g.*, SUM(CASE WHEN o.upper_id = #{id} AND o.lowerId = g.id AND o.ownershipType = 'Group' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS suma FROM group_table g LEFT JOIN Ownership o ON g.id = o.lowerId WHERE g.DTYPE = 'Group' GROUP BY g.id HAVING suma = 0

SELECT g.* FROM group_table g CROSS JOIN Ownership o1 CROSS JOIN Ownership o2 WHERE o1.ownershipType = 'ITEM' AND g.DTYPE = 'BigGroup' AND o2.ownershipType = 'GROUP' AND ((o1.upper_id = g.id AND o1.lowerId = #{id}) OR (o1.lowerId = #{id} AND o2.upper_id = g.id AND o2.lowerId = o1.upper_id)) group by g.id
